column4: ok, i have sound, (thought i didnt) but cant open alsamixer...  any ideas?
and alsa is installed? wierd amixer comes with alsa in ubuntu afaik
i even uninstalled and reinstalled it... trying to fix. no go
hmm thats odd. i have no clue
you probly dont have the ncurses library
or, i guess more importantly - what are they?
any idea how to install them?
if gnome-alsamixer works there shouldnt be a need to
i was just gonna say, gnome-alsamixer is just a gui version of alsamixer, so i would think one works, the other underlying one works too
the gnome-alsamixer is the gui and alsamixer runs in terminal using ncurses which is a sort of text based gui
i think the configuration files for alsamixer are futzed up....
probly, but sound does work right
yep, so not the biggest deal
ok well id suggest using the task bar app for volume management. i really have no clue what do do to get it back
